title: Champ select summoner spell bug
body: I've had two queues in a row where the client freezes when i try to change one of my summoner spells (resulting in not being able to, for example, changing to my jungle masteries or changing my champ after swapping to {{summoner:11}} from whatever i had before) is anyone else finding this?

replies.body: yeah the same happenes to me

went into a couple of games, and everytime i change summoner spells, i would freeze as well
 
another bug that i had after recent patch was that my messages was structured differently, whenever i messaged my friends it would continue on, even if my friend messaged me in between
it is really annoying plz fiz rito
I've had to dodge a few times because of this, hopefully Riot helps :/
happen to me also after changing from {{summoner:11}}  to {{summoner:3}}  my screeen went dark and didnt let me change masteries or runes or click anywhere
Im actually having the exact same issue :/ Hopefully someone will see this thread
